text: What is happening under the hood when you run `] add <package_name>` ? Why does it always take minutes to run, sometimes only to tell me (correctly) that the package is not registered anywhere? Is it just looking for the package in that time?

elements.text: What is happening under the hood when you run
? Why does it always take minutes to run, sometimes only to tell me (correctly) that the package is not registered anywhere? Is it just looking for the package in that time?

text: It's probably because there is connection problems between you and the server

elements.text: It's probably because there is connection problems between you and the server

text:
It can be due to firewall issues (especially if you're on a corporate firewall). Else, you can try to run
```ENV["JULIA_PKG_SERVER"] = ""```
, that will make Julia fetch servers from GitHub instead of its own servers.

text: Hmm, sounds likely. The university's internet connection is terrible.
